import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; function Games() { const { t } = useLanguage(); const [playerStats] = useState({ totalGamesPlayed: 47, skillPoints: 2840, badges: 12, level: 8 }); const games = [ { id: 1, name: t('games.logicLoop'), logo: 'üß†', category: t('games.logicCoding'), difficulty: t('games.intermediate'), players: '15K+', rating: 4.8, description: 'Master coding logic through interactive challenges', estimatedTime: '15-30 min per session' }, { id: 2, name: t('games.careerXP'), logo: 'üöÄ', category: t('games.careerSimulation'), difficulty: t('games.beginner'), players: '25K+', rating: 4.9, description: 'Build your career through realistic simulations', estimatedTime: '20-45 min per challenge' }, { id: 3, name: 'HackQuest', logo: '‚ö°', category: 'Hackathon Simulation', difficulty: 'Advanced', players: '8K+', rating: 4.7, description: 'Experience virtual hackathon events', estimatedTime: '2-6 hours per hackathon' } ]; const achievements = [ { icon: 'üèÜ', title: 'Logic Master', description: 'Completed 50 LogicLoop challenges' }, { icon: 'üíº', title: 'Career Explorer', description: 'Unlocked 5 different career paths' }, { icon: '‚ö°', title: 'Hack Champion', description: 'Won 3 HackQuest competitions' }, { icon: 'üéØ', title: 'Skill Collector', description: 'Earned 2500+ skill points' } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

{t('games.title')}

{t('games.subtitle')}

{/* Player Stats */}
üéÆ
{playerStats.totalGamesPlayed}
{t('games.gamesPlayed')}
‚≠ê
{playerStats.skillPoints}
{t('games.skillPoints')}
üèÖ
{playerStats.badges}
{t('games.badges')}
üìà
{t('games.level')} {playerStats.level}
Current Level
{/* Games Grid */}
{games.map((game) => (
{game.logo}

{game.name}

{game.category}

‚≠ê {game.rating} üë• {game.players}

{game.description}

üéØ Difficulty: {game.difficulty}
‚è±Ô∏è Time: {game.estimatedTime}
))}
{/* Achievements */}

üèÜ {t('games.achievements')}

{achievements.map((achievement, index) => (
{achievement.icon}

{achievement.title}

{achievement.description}

))}
); } export default Games;
